Reviews.Content: Nice place just off jl poppies 1 AP Inn is a nice little hotel located just of poppies lane 1 in central kuta. The hotel features spacious clean rooms with somewhat basic furniture. Facilities include air-con, fridge, and a bathroom with a tub. The location is a bit difficult to reach by car, which is common in this part of town. It is possible to drive right up to the hotel however, and it has a few parking spaces too. There is a good size pool with this hotel, and also a nice poolside bar serving various drinks. Included (set) breakfast is served at the hotels restaurant. Breakfast options include both local and continental, and the food is of good quality.
Reviews.Author: Ben2007
